item.title: New 24/7 sever
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

[quote=“guthans owe1, post:1, topic:129909”]IVE JUST WELLL I THINK IVE JUST GOT MY SEVER UP AND IT GONER BE MASSED 24/7 WELL fist 5 ppl ADMIN U NEED Hamach TAKE 2 SEC TO DWONLOAD AND INSTALL THINK ABOUT IT PLZ PM ME BACK OR EMIAL ME AT pim105@hotmail.co.uk
thanks holly

chanal is run3scape 1
password is 1
lol hope to see u soon[/quote]

First off all, if you want to advertise this is the wrong place.
Iether go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
Or you could always google for a “RuneScape Private server advertisement” section on any other forum.

And one other thing.
If you are releasing a 24/7 server it will not be on hamachi.
24/7 servers atract allot people.
But you can only hold like 10-20people in 1hamachi channel.
So before releasing you would need like atleast 10-25 hamachi channels open.
And one other thing.

Learn to type first before you plan to release a server.
oh and btw, try to atract people into your server by telling them why they should join.
are there any special items. special skills?
What are the rules and so on…

So please go advertise somewhere else.
And keep this section clean.

So bye bye. (I’m not going on to your server!)
